page.title: Trials and judicial hearings following the 2011 Egyptian revolution

rev.diff:
Line 49: Line 49:
The general prosecutor Abdel Magid Mahmud ordered the financial assets inside the country of Mubarak and his family members be frozen, Al Jazeera reported. On March 17, 2011 Senator John Kerry, head of foreign relations committee of the congress, officially confirmed the government of the United States froze assets worth $31 billion belonging to Mubarak, including property and bank accounts.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.masrawy.com/News/Egypt/Politics/2011/march/17/mubarak_usa.aspx |title=Ø¬ÙÙ ÙÙØ±Ù: Ø«Ø±ÙØ© ÙØ¨Ø§Ø±Ù 31.5 ÙÙÙØ§Ø± Ø¯ÙÙØ§Ø± Ø¨Ø£ÙØ±ÙÙØ§ ÙØ­Ø¯ÙØ§ |publisher=Masrawy.com |date=2011-03-17 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref>
The general prosecutor Abdel Magid Mahmud ordered the financial assets inside the country of Mubarak and his family members be frozen, Al Jazeera reported. On March 17, 2011 Senator John Kerry, head of foreign relations committee of the congress, officially confirmed the government of the United States froze assets worth $31 billion belonging to Mubarak, including property and bank accounts.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.masrawy.com/News/Egypt/Politics/2011/march/17/mubarak_usa.aspx |title=Ø¬ÙÙ ÙÙØ±Ù: Ø«Ø±ÙØ© ÙØ¨Ø§Ø±Ù 31.5 ÙÙÙØ§Ø± Ø¯ÙÙØ§Ø± Ø¨Ø£ÙØ±ÙÙØ§ ÙØ­Ø¯ÙØ§ |publisher=Masrawy.com |date=2011-03-17 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref>
â
On April 13, The general prosecutor order the arrest of Former Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak and his sons, Alaa and Gamal, for 15 days as part of an inquiry into the use of force and violence against pro-democracy rallyists and charges of corruption<ref>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-13058855</ref>.
+
On April 13, The general prosecutor order the arrest of Former Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak and his sons, Alaa and Gamal, for 15 days as part of an inquiry into the use of force and violence against pro-democracy rallyists and charges of corruption.<ref>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-13058855</ref>
===Rachid Mohamed Rachid===
===Rachid Mohamed Rachid===
